attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
Faith schools in the UK are now teaching a course that allows the following to be taught to children:

# The Loch Ness Monster appears to be a plesiosaur and disproves evolution

# Apartheid was good for South Africa because it "made it possible for each group to maintain and pass on their culture and heritage to their children"

# 'No transitional fossils have been or ever will be discovered because God created each type of fish, amphibian, and reptile as separate, unique animals.'

This is nothing but academic vandalism, and the part about Apartheid should terrify us all. Please sign to secure an education for the next generation.
